name: Hard Mode
description:
Keep moving at all times. Don't stand in the lava. Don't touch the kill balls.

Destroy all the generators to bring down the boss's shields. 

Controls

W, A, S, D to move. SPACE to jump. LEFT MOUSE to shoot. R to reload.

ESC at any time to pause and open the menu.

Strafe Jumping

Increase your max movement speed by strafe jumping. This will be required to survive at higher difficulties.
